head.title: S. Gregg Renfrew, William D. Orr

hedline.hl1: S. Gregg Renfrew, William D. Orr

block.p: Susan G. Renfrew and Robert M. Bender of New York have announced the engagement of Mrs. Renfrew's daughter, Susan Gregg Renfrew, to William Dennison Orr, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas Orr of Darien, Conn. A July wedding is planned.

Miss Renfrew, 24, is known as S. Gregg. She is a marketing representative for CCA Financial Services Inc., a computer and industrial-equipment leasing company in Richmond. She is also the daughter of Reno Bartlett Renfrew of Dallas. Her mother is the president of Carnegie Hill Properties Inc., a real-estate agency in New York. The prospective bride's stepfather is the chief executive of the American Red Cross in Greater New York.

Susan G. Renfrew and Robert M. Bender of New York have announced the engagement of Mrs. Renfrew's daughter, Susan Gregg Renfrew, to William Dennison Orr, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas Orr of Darien, Conn. A July wedding is planned.

Miss Renfrew, 24, is known as S. Gregg. She is a marketing representative for CCA Financial Services Inc., a computer and industrial-equipment leasing company in Richmond. She is also the daughter of Reno Bartlett Renfrew of Dallas. Her mother is the president of Carnegie Hill Properties Inc., a real-estate agency in New York. The prospective bride's stepfather is the chief executive of the American Red Cross in Greater New York.

Mr. Orr, 24, is a bond trader at Craigie Inc., an investment banking concern in Richmond. He graduated from St. Lawrence University. His father owns Tom Orr Medical Publications, a magazine distribution company in Darien.
